application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1-Horse ChestnutReduce lateral crown spread to ensure 3m clearance from building.Lift over footpath and road to ensure statutory clearance height.Remove all dead branches and thin out all epicormic growth.T2-AshReduce lateral crown spread over neighbouring side by 2-3m from branch tips T3-AshRemove all dead branchesT4-LimesRow of trees along the rear boundary. Reduce overweight lateral branches over the neighbouring property by 2-3m from branch tips to lessen end weight. Thin crowns by 10% to improve light and airflowT5-AshReduce large lateral over neighbouring property by 3-4m to lessen end weight.Remove all dead branchesT6-Horse Chestnut (Neighbouring tree)Reduce lateral crown spread over garden by 2-3m from branch tips to improve clearanceT7-London Plane (Neighbouring tree)Reduce lateral crown spread over garden by 2-3m from branch tips to improve clearance
